name: webvr-physics
description: Cross platform VR input capabilities combined with physics engine

scripts.build: browserify --standalone RayInput -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/ray-input.js -o build/ray.js && uglify -s build/ray.js -o build/ray.min.js && browserify --standalone Example -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/example/main.js -o build/example.js
scripts.build-ragdoll: browserify --standalone RayInput -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/ray-input.js -o build/ray.js && uglify -s build/ray.js -o build/ray.min.js && browserify --standalone Ragdoll -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/ragdoll/main.js -o build/ragdoll.js
scripts.build-trimesh: browserify --standalone RayInput -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/ray-input.js -o build/ray.js && uglify -s build/ray.js -o build/ray.min.js && browserify --standalone Trimesh -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/trimesh/main.js -o build/trimesh.js
scripts.build-basketball: browserify --standalone RayInput -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/ray-input.js -o build/ray.js && uglify -s build/ray.js -o build/ray.min.js && browserify --standalone Basketball -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/basketball/main.js -o build/basketball.js
scripts.start: watchify -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/example/main.js src/example/renderer.js -o build/example.js
scripts.start-ragdoll: watchify -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/ragdoll/main.js src/ragdoll/renderer.js -o build/ragdoll.js
scripts.start-trimesh: watchify -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/trimesh/main.js src/trimesh/renderer.js -o build/trimesh.js
scripts.start-basketball: watchify -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/basketball/main.js src/basketball/renderer.js -o build/basketball.js

author: Boris Smus, Hans Beemsterboer
